description: This is the Operate Loopback Notification sent by the agent.
The actual attribute value is sent by the agent in the form of
a varbind list, as additional objects, as per SMIv2 (RFC2578, Section 8.1).
This is the Release Loopback Notification sent by the agent.
The actual attribute value is sent by the agent in the form of
a varbind list, as additional objects, as per SMIv2 (RFC2578, Section 8.1).
This trap is sent each time a threshold on a PM condition

description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the
variables.name: CM-SA-MIB::esaProbeStatsThresholdIndex

description: The object identifier of the particular variable to be
sampled. Objects of the esaProbeStatsTable table are
monitored. Only variables that resolve to an ASN.1 primitive
type of INTEGER (INTEGER, Integer32, Counter32, PerfCounter64
Gauge, or TimeTicks) may be sampled.
variables.name: CM-SA-MIB::esaProbeStatsThresholdVariable

description: Lower 32 bits of the absolute value of the threshold.
variables.name: CM-SA-MIB::esaProbeStatsThresholdAbsValueLo

description: Higher 32 bits of the absolute value of the threshold.
variables.name: CM-SA-MIB::esaProbeStatsThresholdAbsValueHi
